> [!abstract] Challenge Description
> > Anonymous
> ## 100
> Annoying? Yes.
> 
> Not worth it? Definitely!
> 
> But, those are the characteristics that the Ætheric order expects from a trained soldier: bravery, ingenuity, and unwavering perserverence with very little expectation for a reward.
> 
> The flag is in the following format: `NexusCTF{<flag>}`

Each row looks like 
```
----- ----- .---- .---- ----- .---- .---- .---- / ----- ----- .---- .---- ----- ----- .---- ----- / ----- ----- .---- ----- ----- ----- ----- ----- 
```

Map each set of characters to `0` and `1`.

```python
with open(r'C:\Users\mingh\Documents\Github\CTF-writeups\NexusCTF\Miscellaneous\Annoying Yes\encoded.txt', 'r') as f:
    input_data = f.read().strip()
    lines = input_data.split('/')
    print(lines)

    output = ''
    for line in lines:
        chars = line.split(' ')
        for char in chars:
            if char == '-----':
                output += '0'
            elif char == '.----':
                output += '1'
        output += ' '
    print(output)
```

Taking it from binary still gives an encoded result.
`72 69 90 88 69 78 66 82 71 77 50 84 75 78 66 86 79 73 50 68 73 78 74 86 71 90 90 84 69 77 90 87 79 69 51 68 69 78 82 89 71 53 88 84 77 77 74 84 71 81 50 84 75 78 90 86 71 77 51 84 75 79 74 86 71 52 90 87 52 78 74 86 71 81 51 68 75 78 66 85 79 73 50 68 81 78 74 85 71 89 50 68 71 78 82 86 79 69 51 68 73 78 73 61`

From decimal: `HEZXENBRGM2TKNBVOI2DINJVGZZTEMZWOE3DENRYG5XTMMJTGQ2TKNZVGM3TKOJVG4ZW4NJVGQ3DKNBUOI2DQNJUGY2DGNRVOE3DINI=`

From Base32: `93r4135545r44556s236q62687o613455753759573n5546544r485464365q645`

Notice that there are only 6 unique letters, perhaps a ROT13 cipher (shift by 13): `93e4135545e44556f236d62687b613455753759573a5546544e485464365d645`

Looks like hex, however does not decode, so we will try reverse: `546d563464584e4456455a375957357554316b78626d632f65544e5455314e39`

Now we can decode from hex: `TmV4dXNDVEZ7YW5uT1kxbmc/eTNTU1N9`

From Base64: `NexusCTF{annOY1ng?y3SSS}`

[CyberChef](https://gchq.github.io/CyberChef/#recipe=From_Binary('Space',8)From_Hex('Auto'/disabled)From_Decimal('Space',false)From_Base32('A-Z2-7%3D',true)ROT13(true,true,false,13)Reverse('Character')From_Hex('Auto')From_Base64('A-Za-z0-9%2B/%3D',true,false)&&oeol=NEL)

---
> [!success] Flag: `NexusCTF{annOY1ng?y3SSS}`
